overall_supervision_plan: OIC and RSO will orient soldiers to the range and conduct a safety brief immediately following range occupation. Soldiers will coach/safety each other on the firing line with NCOs safetying in a 1:1 ratio. Newly identified risks will be recorded and mitigated accordingly and risk acceptance will be improved at the appropriate level. Every Soldier will be considered a safety. If they see an unsafe act they will call a cease fire and notify everyone to stop training until the issue is resolved. This is a living document. OIC and RSO will continuously monitor all aspects of the Stress Range.
